asset.title: How Gabriel Shocks Affect Stopping Distances
asset.description:
Buy Them Here:

http://www.autoanything.com/suspension-systems/75A5896A0A0.aspx

Your car's shocks do a whole lot more than smooth out bumps in the road. The truth is, shock absorbers also reduce the amount your car's nose drops under braking, which allows your rear tires to stay in full contact with the road. With worn shocks installed, you're car's braking effectiveness can be reduced by 50%. Gabriel shocks drastically reduce nose dive, so your car's braking system can work as intended.

For our full line of Gabriel shocks look here:

http://www.autoanything.com/shop/gabriel

And for our entire selection of shock absorbers, shop here:

http://www.autoanything.com/suspension-systems/20A50472A1.aspx
